subdisciplines.name: Immigration Policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of government policies and regulations regarding immigration, including border control, citizenship requirements, and refugee resettlement.

subdisciplines.name: Transnationalism
subdisciplines.description: The study of the ways in which people and cultures from different countries interact and influence one another across national borders.

subdisciplines.name: Intercultural Communication
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people from different cultural backgrounds communicate and interact, including issues of language, identity, and power.
